text:
OK, ALEX,
CHANGE ME BA-ACK.

OH, BUT DADDY, YOU LOOK
SO CUTE AS A GOAT.

LET'S MAKE HIM
EAT A TIN CAN!
NOT FUNNY, MA-AX.
ALEX, CHANGE ME BA-ACK!
OK, OK.
HUMANOZA ESPINOZA.
OHH.

WE REALLY GOT YOUR GOAT,
HUH, DAD?

THAT'S IT, YOU JUST
LAUGHED YOUR WAY

INTO ONE-HOUR STUDY HALL,
STARTING NOW. LET'S GO.
BUT WE DIDN'T EVEN...

AND THAT MEANS WORKING
ON YOUR WIZARD HOMEWORK
AND NOT MESSING AROUND.
WHO'S LAUGHING NOW, HUH?
[LAUGHS, BLEATS]

THERE'S SOMETHING WRONG
WITH THAT SPELL.
OR MAYBE IT'S ME.

NO, IT'S GOT TO BE
THE SPELL. HEH.

WHAT ARE YOU DOING
ON THE WIZARD COMPUTER?

YEAH, WE'RE SUPPOSED TO
BE DOING OUR HOMEWORK,

NOT SURFING
THE WORLD WIDE WIZ WEB.

I HAVE TO DO
A LITTLE SHOPPING.

I LIKE TO LOOK GOOD
WHEN I'M DOING MY HOMEWORK.

OH, THIS PLACE HAS THE BEST
NO-TRIP HIGH HEELS.

NO MATTER HOW HIGH THE
HEELS ARE, IT'S IMPOSSIBLE
TO TWIST YOUR ANKLE.
I HAVE TO TRY SOME ON.
[COMPUTER DINGS]

MM, THEY WERE CUTER
ON THE SCREEN.

OH, LOOK, HERE'S
SOMETHING FOR JUSTIN.

CHECK IT OUT--
MINI DRAGONS FOR SALE.

OK, NOW I'M GETTING
OUT OF HERE BECAUSE I DON'T
WANT TO GET INVOLVED--

OH, THAT IS
THE CUTEST LITTLE
DOG I'VE EVER SEEN!
HEY, BOY!

NOT ONLY IS HE CUTE,
BUT HE'S ALSO A DRAGON.

THAT'S RIGHT,
A MYTHICAL CREATURE
AND A DOG COMBINED!

NOW TELL ME,
HOW MANY WOULD YOU LIKE?

UH, WE'RE
JUST LOOKING.

WHAT WOULD IT TAKE
FOR ME...

TO GET YOU INVOLVED IN
ONE OF THESE MARVELOUS
LITTLE DRAGON DOGS TODAY?
UH, I DON'T GET IT.

IS IT A DRAGON,
OR IS IT A DOG?

IT WAS CHARMED TO LOOK
LIKE A DOG SO IT COULD
EXIST IN THE REAL WORLD.

NOW BEAT IT, KID.
I'M IN THE MIDDLE OF A SALE.

OK, HOW ARE WE GONNA
HAVE A DRAGON DOG?

MOM WOULD TOTALLY
FREAK OUT.
WAIT!

IF YOU GUYS BUY
RIGHT NOW,

I WILL THROW IN
A SMOKE DETECTOR

AND A SMALL DEVICE
THAT CUTS TOMATOES.

YOU MEAN
LIKE A KNIFE?
KID...

HERE IS A ROLL
OF QUARTERS.
KNOCK YOURSELF OUT.
WITH WHAT?
THE QUARTERS.

HE SEEMS FRIENDLY.
I BET YOU HE'S NOT
MUCH OF A GUARD DOG.

[BARKS]
WHOA!
THAT IS AWESOME.

I LIKE HIM.
HE'S FEISTY.

EH, DRAGON IN A BEAGLE SUIT.
WHAT'S THE BIG DEAL?

OH, I'LL TELL YOU
WHAT THE BIG DEAL IS.

THIS DOG DRAGON
IS ON SALE FOR
5 MILLION CUBIKS.

AND BECAUSE
YOU HAVE A COUPON--
HERE, TAKE THAT.
IT'S 20% OFF.

DUDE, YOU SHOULD TOTALLY
GET HIM. HE'S ON SALE.

PLUS HE'LL THROW
IN A TOMATO SLICER.

SORRY, I CAN'T GET ANOTHER
DOG AGAIN. NO WAY.

NOT AFTER WHAT HAPPENED
WITH WILLY.
WHO'S WILLY?

HE'S, UH,
HE'S THE DOG WE HAD
WHEN YOU WERE A BABY.

OH, NO.
HERE COMES THE TEARS,

OR AS JUSTIN CALLS HIM,
"HIS ALLERGIES."

WHEN I WAS 7,
HE, UH, GOT LOST,

AND I SWORE I'D NEVER
LOVE ANOTHER DOG AGAIN.
I GOTTA GO.

MY ALLERGIES
ARE ACTING UP.

I'LL TAKE HIM. JUSTIN'S
GONNA LOVE ME FOR THIS.

BUT JUSTIN JUST SAID
THAT HE DOESN'T WANT A DOG.

TRUST ME,
JUSTIN WANTS A DOG.

TRUST HER,
JUSTIN WANTS A DOG.

HERE'S 5 MILLION CUBIKS
IN U.S. CURRENCY.

OH, I KNOW
THE EXCHANGE RATE.

I ORDER FROM
THE ABERCROMBIE AND WITCH
CATALOGUE ALL THE TIME.
GOOD.

YOUR 5-SECOND WARRANTY
JUST ENDED RIGHT NOW.

WELL, LET'S GO FIND
A CUTE DOGGIE SWEATER

TO MATCH THAT
CUTE DOGGIE FACE.
COME ON, DRAGON.
[BARKS]
MY DOG BURNT MY HOMEWORK.
THAT'LL BE A NEW ONE.

♪ WELL, YOU KNOW EVERYTHING'S
GONNA BE A BREEZE ♪

♪ THE END WILL NO DOUBT
JUSTIFY THE MEANS ♪

♪ YOU CAN FIX ANY PROBLEM
WITH THE SLIGHTEST OF EASE ♪
♪ YES, PLEASE ♪

♪ BUT YOU MIGHT FIND OUT
IT'LL GO TO YOUR HEAD ♪

♪ WHEN YOU WRITE A REPORT
ON A BOOK YOU NEVER READ ♪

♪ WITH A SNAP OF YOUR FINGERS,
YOU CAN MAKE YOUR BED ♪
♪ THAT'S WHAT I SAID ♪
♪ AHH ♪

♪ EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

♪ WHEN YOU CAN GET
ALL YOU WANTED ♪
♪ IN YOUR WILDEST DREAMS ♪

♪ YOU MIGHT RUN INTO TROUBLE
IF YOU GO TO EXTREMES ♪

♪ BECAUSE EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪
♪ AHH ♪

♪ EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

♪ WHEN YOU CAN HAVE WHAT YOU
WANT BY THE SIMPLEST OF MEANS ♪

♪ BE CAREFUL NOT TO MESS
WITH THE BALANCE OF THINGS ♪
♪ BECAUSE EVERYTHING IS NOT ♪
♪ WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

CAPTIONING MADE POSSIBLE BY
DISNEY--ABC CABLE NETWORKS GROUP

JUSTIN, YOU'RE GONNA LOVE THIS.
CLOSE YOUR EYES.

OK, BUT I'M NOT GONNA
TASTE ANYTHING.
TA-DA!

ALEX, WHAT'S THAT
DRAGON DOG DOING HERE?

I TOLD YOU I DON'T WANT
ANOTHER PET.

WELL, I THINK YOU DO,
AND SO DID THE DRAGON SELLER.

OF COURSE HE DID.
HE'S A DRAGON SELLER.

AND BESIDES,
WHAT ARE YOU GONNA
TELL MOM AND DAD?

MOM AND DAD DON'T HAVE TO
KNOW HE'S A DRAGON.

I'LL JUST SAY
THAT I FOUND A DOG.

'CAUSE IT'S A DOG,
AND IT LOOKS LIKE A DOG...
THAT BARKS FIRE.

OK, I APPRECIATE
WHAT YOU'RE TRYING
TO DO FOR ME HERE,

BUT I CAN'T GO DOWN
THIS PATH AGAIN.

AND BESIDES, YOU KNOW
ABOUT MY ALLERGIES.
IT'S CRYING.
I'M ALLERGIC TO SADNESS!

LOOK, I KNOW LOSING WILLY
BROKE YOUR HEART,

BUT THE TRUTH IS HE DIDN'T
RUN AWAY AND GET LOST.
HE...HE GOT OUT BECAUSE...

BECAUSE I KIND OF
LET HIM OUT.
IT WAS YOU?

MOM AND DAD TOLD ME
IT WAS THE PIZZA
DELIVERY GUY!

I HAVEN'T EATEN PIZZA
IN LIKE 8 YEARS!

DON'T BE MAD. I WAS 5.
I WANTED TO TAKE WILLY
FOR A WALK,

AND HE WANTED TO GO
FOR A RUN.

YOU SAYING
YOU FEEL GUILTY?
RARELY, BUT YES.
ALL RIGHT.
HEY, BUDDY!
THAT'S A GOOD BOY.

OH, HE JUST DID
THAT THING WITH
HIS NOSE LIKE WILLY DID!

DO YOU LIKE
YOUR NEW HOME, BOY?
IT CAN NOD! HA HA HA!

THANKS, ALEX.
HE'S AWESOME.

AH, I LOVE
A GOOD LUNCH RUSH.
ME, TOO.

I JUST WISH EVERYONE
WOULDN'T SHOW UP AT ONCE.
WHAT'S THAT?
A DOG. JUST A DOG.

YEAH, WHAT'S
IT DOING HERE?

UH, I FOUND IT WANDERING
ALONE IN WAVERLY PLACE,

LONELY,
LOOKING FOR A HOME,

LOOKING FOR
A HALF-LATINO FAMILY.

IT'S DESTINY.
WE HAVE TO KEEP HIM.
HEY, BUDDY.
HOW YOU DOING, BOY?
GOOD BOY. SPEAK!

NO, DON'T SPEAK!
DON'T SPEAK! SHH!
WHY NOT?

OH, BECAUSE IF HE SPEAKS,
THERE'LL BE FIRE.

WH--
WHAT?

WHAT MAX
IS TRYING TO SAY

IS THAT HE'S SAVING
HIS VOICE FOR THOSE
BARKING DOG ALBUMS.

HE DOES A MEAN
BON JOVI.

WELL, SEE?
HE'S MULTI-TALENTED.

I--I THINK WE SHOULD
KEEP HIM, THERESA.

OH, WE CAN'T KEEP
A LOST DOG.

SOMEONE'S PROBABLY
OUT OF THEIR MIND
LOOKING FOR HIM.

OH, THAT IS SO TRUE.
YOU'RE RIGHT, MOM.

AND WE SHOULD PROBABLY
PUT FLYERS UP IN THE CITY

SO WE CAN FIND
ITS RIGHTFUL OWNER.

REALLY?
BUT HE'S SO CUTE.

COME ON, ALEX. YOU PICK
NOW TO BE RESPONSIBLE?
ABSOLUTELY.

WE'LL SCOUR THE CITY
FOR THE OWNER.

AND ON THE OFF CHANCE
THAT WE COME UP SHORT,

ONLY THEN CAN WE
KEEP THE DOG.

HMM. THAT'S, UH,
VERY MATURE, ALEX.
I'M PROUD OF YOU.

OH, SO THAT'S BEEN
YOUR PLAN ALL ALONG, HUH?

PLAY WITH MY FRAGILE HEART,
AND THEN CRUSH IT?

WHAT HAPPENS IF THE RIGHTFUL
DOG OWNER COMES ALONG

AND SEES
THE "LOST DOG" SIGN?

NO ONE'S GONNA
CLAIM IT BECAUSE
IT'S NOT LOST, OR A DOG.

AND YOU'RE
THE SMART ONE?

[SIGHS] YOU'RE RIGHT.
I'M SORRY.

I'M JUST A LITTLE PANICKED
OVER WHAT HAPPENED
WITH WILLY.
LET IT GO. I WAS 5.

AS LONG AS HE'S HERE,
WHAT SHOULD WE CALL HIM?

OOH, I KNOW!
HERE'S AN IDEA! SPOT.
NO, WAIT. PAWS.
OOH, OOH! PATCHES!

I THINK WE SHOULD
CALL IT DRAGON.

WHAT? WHY WOULD WE
CALL IT THAT?
YEAH, WHY?
'CAUSE IT'S A DRAGON!

I SWEAR I DIDN'T
SAY ANYTHING.

ITS NAME IS
RIGHT HERE ON ITS TAG.
IT'S NAME IS DRAGON.

OH! HEH.
[SIGHS]

THE NAME DRAGON
IS ON ITS TAG.

I LOVE THE NAME DRAGON.
GOOD EYE, MOM.

IT'S LIKE IT WAS MEANT
TO BE. OK, LET'S TALK
ABOUT SOMETHING ELSE NOW!

HEY, CHARLIE, COULD I HANG
ONE OF THESE "FOUND DOG"
SIGNS ON YOUR STAND?

WHAT'S IN IT FOR ME,
SWEETHEART?
WHERE'S CHARLIE?

LET'S JUST SAY CHARLIE
WENT TO THE BANK

TO GET THE CANDY
HE OWES ME.
AND BY CANDY I MEAN MONEY.

YEAH, I KIND OF FIGURED THAT
WHEN YOU SAID "BANK."

UM, CAN I HANG ONE OF THESE
SIGNS ON YOUR STAND?

I'LL GIVE YOU
A BRONX-STRAMI SWISS ON RYE.

HOW ABOUT A BRONX-STRAMI
SWISS AND A KISS?

HOW ABOUT A BRONX-STRAMI
SWISS AND A BOWL OF SOUP?

CUP OF SOUP. FOOT-LONG.
NO CHEAPIN' OUT ON THE CHEESE.
AND A MEANINGFUL HUG.
NO HUG. DONE.

YOU'LL COME AROUND.
THEY ALWAYS DO.

WELL, I DON'T KNOW
WHO THEY ARE,
BUT I'M NOT ONE OF THEM.
HE'S JUST LIKE WILLY!

HE LIKES DOG TREATS,
SQUEAK TOYS,
AND TOILET WATER.
[SQUEAKING]
HE ATE A SQUEAK TOY.

THAT'S OK, DRAGON.
YOU'RE STILL THE BEST.

OH, LET ME GET
A PICTURE OF YOU, BOY.
SIT.

THIS'LL GO GREAT IN
THE ACTIVITIES CHAPTER

OF THE PHOTO ALBUM
I'M PUTTING TOGETHER.

CUTE PUP.
WHAT'S HIS NAME?
DRAGON.

NOT--NOT BECAUSE
HE IS A DRAGON.

NO, BECAUSE THERE'S
NO SUCH THING AS DRAGONS.

HA! I SHOULD
STOP TALKING.
DOES HE FETCH?

NO, HE DOESN'T FETCH.
YOU PROBABLY DON'T
WANT TO DO THAT!
[DRAGON BARKS]
WERE THOSE WINGS?

OH, OH, YEAH.
GOOD ONE, FRANKIE.
YEAH, A DOG WITH WINGS.

YEAH, DRAGON'S JUST LIKE
MICHAEL JORDAN.

EVERY ONCE IN A WHILE,
A SUPERSTAR COMES ALONG

AND ELEVATES
THE WHOLE GAME. HEH.
WHY IS IT BURNT?
IT--IT'S NOT BURNT.

IT'S JUST--
IT'S JUST LIKE TOAST.

YOU JUST BRUSH OFF
ALL THE BLACK STUFF,

AND IT'S
GOOD AS NEW. SEE?

ALL RIGHT,
IT WORKS FOR NOW.

BUT SOMETHING DOESN'T
SMELL RIGHT ON WAVERLY PLACE.
YOU LEAVE THE BOROUGH,
YOU CHECK IN WITH ME.
THAT WAS A CLOSE CALL.

WE GOTTA TRAIN DRAGON TO
ACT LIKE A NORMAL DOG.

[MEOW]
OH, THERE'S A CAT.
GO GET HIM!
NOT YOU. DRAGON!
HEY, AH! STAY DOWN.
AH, HE DID IT!

BUT IT WAS KIND
OF COOLER WHEN--

SHH! DON'T SAY F-L-Y
AROUND HIM.
OH, FLY!
[GASPS]

BOY, IT'S SO HOT
OUT HERE.

FLY! FLY!
WHAT?

OH, NOTHING.
UH, I SAID THERE'S
A LOT OF FLIES OUT HERE.
WHERE?

NOT UP THERE.
I MEANT ANTS.
OH.
FLYING ANTS. HEH HEH.
I HATE ANTS.

YOU KNOW,
THERE WAS THIS ONE TIME,

YOUR FATHER FELL ASLEEP
WITH A DANISH
ON HIS CHEST,
AND IN THE MORNING--

WE KNOW, WE KNOW.
HE HAD AN ANT BEARD.
GO, GO. FLY, FLY.
GO GET THE ANT SPRAY.

MAN, WE'RE LUCKY THAT
THE WORD "FLY" CAME UP
A LOT IN CONVERSATION.
[WINGS FLAPPING]
AAH!

PLEASE TELL ME
THAT WAS SLOBBER.
OK. THAT WAS SLOBBER.

COME ON, GUYS.
WE GOTTA GO CHECK ON DRAGON.

YEAH, WE'VE NEVER
LEFT HIM HOME ALONE BEFORE.

HEY, GUYS,
I'M SURE HE'S JUST FINE.

AND IF ANYONE MESSED
WITH HIM, HE'D JUST
BREATHE FIRE.

YEAH, THAT'S WHAT
WE'RE WORRIED ABOUT.

WHAT? I THOUGHT WE JUST
DIDN'T WANT HIM TO
TAKE LEAKS IN THE HOUSE.

HEY, GUYS. GOTTA GO
CHECK ON DRAGON.
WAIT! JUSTIN?

JUSTIN!
I'LL GO TELL HIM.
WHAT'S THE MATTER?

UM, THOSE FLYERS
YOU PUT UP WORKED.

DRAGON'S RIGHTFUL OWNER
CAME BY AND PICKED HIM UP

WHILE YOU KIDS
WERE AT SCHOOL.
WHAT RIGHTFUL OWNER?

HEY, GUYS,
WHERE'S DRAGON?

HIS--HIS OWNER
CLAIMED HIM.
HIS OWNER?
HONEY, I'M SO SORRY.

I KNOW HOW MUCH
YOU LOVED HIM.
HE'S GONE?

THERE'S SO MUCH
WE DIDN'T GET TO DO.
JUSTIN, I'M SORRY.
THANKS A LOT.

THIS IS WHY
I DIDN'T WANT TO GET
CLOSE TO ANOTHER DOG.
YOU DID IT TO ME AGAIN.
YOU LOST YOUR FOUND DOG?

WHY DON'T YOU REST YOUR HEAD
ON FRANKIE'S SHOULDER

AND TELL HIM
ALL ABOUT IT.

I WOULD, BUT I DON'T
HAVE TIME FOR YOU
TO GET A LADDER.

THIS IS SERIOUS.
SOMEONE CLAIMED DRAGON,

BUT WHOEVER IT WAS
WASN'T THE REAL OWNER.

THAT'S WEIRD 'CAUSE HE
LOOKED LIKE A DOG LOVER.
YOU SAW HIM? WHO WAS HE?

YOU GOT A MEATBALL SUB
WITH MY NAME ON IT?

I'LL GIVE YOU
THE BREAD NOW,

AND YOU'LL GET YOUR
MEATBALLS AFTER WE
FIND THE DOGNAPPER.

GUY CAME OUT WITH YOUR DOG
AND BOUGHT THIS.

A PROGRAM
FOR THE HUDSON DOG SHOW.

THE HUDSON DOG SHOW?
WHEN IS IT?

WHY DON'T YOU BUY A COPY
AND FIND OUT?
I HAVE TO BUY IT?

DO I COME INTO
YOUR RESTAURANT,

LICK A SANDWICH,
AND LEAVE?
ZINGER!
THAT'LL BE $8.00, PLEASE.
[SCOFFS] OK.
[SIGHS]
IT'S TODAY!

I'D LIKE TO RETURN
THIS FOR A REFUND.
ZINGER!
AHEM.
MAY I HELP YOU?

YEAH, CAN I GET
A HOUND OF CORNED BEEF?

I'M SORRY,
DID YOU SAY "HOUND"?
NO.

OH. MAN, EVERYTHING REMINDS
ME OF DRAGON. EVERYTHING!
THAT'S ROUGH.
RUFF!

THAT'S WHAT
HE USED TO SAY.
UM...

A POUND OF CORNED BEEF
COMING UP.
THANK YOU.

MAX, CAN YOU GO
IN THE BACK AND GRAB
SOME MORE TO-GO PUPS?
PUPS?
NO, TO-GO CUPS.

ALL HE CAN THINK ABOUT
IS DRAGON.

JUSTIN, MAX,
YOU'RE COMING WITH ME.
WE'RE GETTING DRAGON BACK.

OH! DAD, WE'RE TAKING
OUR LUNCH BREAK.

COME ON, GUYS,
HURRY!

FURRY! HE WAS SO FURRY!
I MISS HIM!

3 TICKETS FOR THE
DOG SHOW, PLEASE.
IT'S SOLD OUT.
WHAT?

APPARENTLY A LOT OF PEOPLE
LIKE WATCHING DOGS
RUN AROUND ON PLASTIC GRASS.
NO DOG, NO WAY IN.

LARGE FRIES. SEE IF
THERE'S A TOY INCLUDED.

ALEX WILL TALK US IN.
SHE'S A MASTER.

I TOTALLY UNDERSTAND.
COME ON, GUYS.
IT'S NOT HAPPENING.

WHAT? THAT'S IT? WE'RE NOT
GETTING MY DOG BACK?

OF COURSE WE'RE GETTING
YOUR DOG BACK.

WE JUST NEED
TO GET A DOG FIRST.

WHERE ARE WE GONNA FIND
A DOG WITHOUT AN OWNER?
IT WORKED. WE'RE IN.
LET'S GET MAX.
OK. HUMANOZA ESPINOZA.
BEING A DOG IS WEIRD.

ALL YOU WANT TO DO
IS JUST CHASE YOUR TAIL.

I DON'T THINK I GOT
THE SPELL QUITE RIGHT.

WHAT MAKES YOU
SAY THAT?
[SNIFFING]

UGH, I CAN STILL
SMELL EVERYTHING...

EVERYTHING I WANT
TO PUT IN MY MOUTH.
[GROWLS]
LOOK! THERE HE IS.
DRAGON?

AND THE DRAGON SELLER.
HE STOLE DRAGON BACK.
HE'S A CON WIZARD!

COME ON,
LET'S GO GET DRAGON.

HEY, YOU'RE A THIEF.
YOU SOLD US THAT DOG
AND THEN STOLE IT BACK.

IT'S THE CIRCLE OF LIFE,
CHILDREN.
WE WANT OUR DOG BACK.

LOOK, KID,
YOU PLAYED THE GAME,
AND YOU LOST.

YOU KNOW WHAT?
YOU GO HOME,

AND THE MONEY
 YOU SPENT ON THE DOG

WAS A LESSON WELL LEARNED.
YOU'RE WELCOME.

NO DEAL. WE'RE TAKING
DRAGON HOME.
I DON'T THINK SO.
LOOK, HE'S GONE.

[SNIFFS]
OH, HE'S NOT GONE.

HE'S STILL HERE.
I CAN SMELL HIM.

ALL WE HAVE TO DO
IS GET MAX TO SMELL
THE BEAGLES.

HOW DO YOU KNOW
HE'S STILL A BEAGLE?

I CHANGED HIM
FROM A DRAGON
INTO A BEAGLE.

I CAN CHANGE HIM
 INTO ANY DOG
 THAT I WANT.

I CAN CHANGE HIM
INTO A TERRIER MIX,

INTO AN IRISH
BLOODHOUND,
OR TO WHATEVER THAT IS.

OH, IT'S NOT THAT.
THAT IS A RAT
WITH A BLOW DRY.
[MOUTHS WORDS]
MAX!

CAN YOU
SNIFF OUT DRAGON?
I CAN TRY.
[SNIFFING] NOPE.
[SNIFFING] NOT THIS ONE.

[SNIFFING]
OH, DEFINITELY NOT THIS ONE.

ARE YOU THROUGH?
FREAK.

BOB, BRING AROUND
THE SECURITY TRAILER.
I GOT A SNIFFER.

GREAT. HOW ARE WE
GONNA FIND DRAGON NOW?

OUR SNIFFER JUST GOT
THROWN IN DOG SHOW JAIL.
OH, I KNOW!

DRAGONS
DON'T CHASE CATS.

IF WE HAD A CAT,
ALL THE DOGS WOULD
GO WILD CHASING IT,

EXCEPT FOR DRAGON.
I'M ON IT.

I'LL CHANGE MYSELF
INTO A CAT.

BUT YOU ALWAYS
MESS UP THE SPELL.

DO YOU HAVE A BETTER IDEA?
DIDN'T THINK SO.
ANIMOSA ESPINOZA.
HOW DO I LOOK? CUTE, HUH?
[MEOWS]
[PEOPLE SHOUTING]
[PEOPLE SCREAMING]
UH...

UH, I THINK YOU MESSED UP
THE SPELL AGAIN.
OH, NO! I'M THE TIGER.

I GOTTA GET
THAT SPELL RIGHT.

BOB,
BRING THE CATNIP.
ALL OF IT.

MAKE SURE I GET
EXTRA KETCHUP.
BOB...
BOB?
DRAGON!

OK, I LEFT HIM A BEAGLE,
AND YOU FOUND HIM.

GOOD WORK,
VELMA AND SHAGGY.
COME ON.
[GROWLING]
UH...
SCARY.

I STILL KNOW
IT'S YOU, KID.

EH, IT'S WORTH A SHOT.
HUMANOZA ESPINOZA.

WOULD YOU LIKE
TO EXCUSE YOURSELF
TO A LITTER BOX?
WE'RE KIND OF BUSY.

WELL, I'D LIKE
TO STAY AND CHAT,

BUT I'VE GOT A DOG HERE
I HAVE TO SELL.
AGAIN AND AGAIN AND AGAIN.
NOT SO FAST.

LOOK, YOU WERE
RIGHT BEFORE. WE'VE
LEARNED OUR LESSON.
NO HARD FEELINGS.
I HAVE HARD FEELINGS!

WE'RE JUST KIDS,
AND WE SHOULD PROBABLY
THANK SOMEONE LIKE YOU

FOR GIVING US
STREET SMARTS

AND MAKING US
MORE CAUTIOUS
WITH FUTURE PURCHASES.
YEAH.

I AM
A PRETTY GOOD TEACHER.

SO THANK YOU
AND HAVE A GOOD DAY.

BUT, OH,
DON'T FORGET YOUR CAGE.

YOU KNOW, I NEVER THOUGHT
I WOULD SAY THIS
TO A CUSTOMER,

BUT IT HAS BEEN A PLEASURE
SCAMMING YOU.

WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
YOU LET HIM GET AWAY
WITH DRAGON!
YOU'RE RIGHT. I'M SORRY.

NOW ALL YOU HAVE IS...
DRAGON.
[GASPS]
DRAGON!

HOW DID YOU
DO THAT?

I JUST MADE HIM
TAKE THE WRONG CAGE,

LIKE I DO WITH YOU GUYS
AND OUR LUNCHES.
BUT WHO'D HE TAKE?
THE BLOW-DRIED RAT.

I SAW THE CAGE RIGHT THERE,
I THOUGHT ON MY FEET,

AN I OUT-CONNED
THE CON WIZARD.
I'M GOOD. [COUGHING]
HAIRBALL.

YEAH, YOU'RE JUST
THAT GOOD.

SO DRAGON
IS REALLY A DRAGON?
AMAZING!

ACTUALLY, THERE ARE
A LOT OF SECRET DRAGONS.

NO, THAT IN A FAMILY
OF WIZARDS,

I DIDN'T SEE THAT COMING.
STUPID, STUPID, STUPID.
SO CAN WE KEEP HIM?
OH, I DON'T KNOW, HONEY.

MAX WILL FEED HIM
EVERY DAY,

AND JUSTIN WILL GIVE HIM
A BATH AND WALK HIM.
WHAT WILL YOU DO?

I'M DOING IT.
I'M COORDINATING
WHAT YOU GUYS DO.

ACTUALLY, PETS DO TEACH
RESPONSIBILITY.

JERRY, YOU LEAVE WET TOWELS
ON THE BED EVERY DAY.

FINE, I'LL AIR DRY.
CAN WE KEEP HIM?

WELL, I DON'T SEE
WHAT HARM IT COULD DO.

COME ON, DRAGON.
LET'S GO UP TO MY ROOM.
[BARKS, PASSES GAS]

[COUGHING] OH, MAN.
WHOO! SHEILA.

THIS TIME, JERRY,
YOU CAN BLAME A DOG.
THIS TIME.

CAPTIONING MADE POSSIBLE BY
DISNEY--ABC CABLE NETWORKS GROUP

CAPTIONING PERFORMED BY
THE NATIONAL CAPTIONING
INSTITUTE, INC.
